Welcome to Gabe's Game & Website

Where you can have fun with everybody

Hello there. Here is a fun little game where you can draw as long as you want. If you want to claer the canvas of color then just reoload the page. Then use your mouse to draw a grey circle. Maybe you can cover the red line. Have fun!
About me: This was a wierd jorney to make this. my name is gabriel and i made this cool coloring game. I origanally wanted to make pong but the codde din't work so i made a web toy about coloring. You could make a game out of it. IF YOU WANT TO.
